name: NASCAR Racers
description:
NASCAR Racers is a racing-arcade game developed by Software Creations. It was originally released in 2000. Hasbro Interactive published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
NASCAR Racers is available on PC.
Dennis Woodyard produced the game. It was directed by Dennis Woodyard and Joe Barruso. Jeremy Sweet, Kussa Mahchi and Shuki Levy scored the game.
